EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-12-12-Challenging Virtual & Cloud Paradigms.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Free E-Book] How are You Challenging the Virtual Status Quo?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-challenging-virtual-and-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paradigmwp&utm_content=07062016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, For most organizations, business success is a direct function of IT success. In the past traditional IT architectures have been based on silos with computing resources dedicated to specific applications, as well as over-provisioning to accommodate peak demands and potential future growth. Virtualized systems have since replaced these silos with a layer of shared resources. However, virtualization also brings a new set of challenges for the data center. Virtual and cloud environments are dynamic and become infinitely more complex as they scale. Download Challenging Traditional Virtual Cloud Paradigms <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-challenging-virtual-and-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paradigmwp&utm_content=07062016]]> and learn about:
-
Virtualization's transformative impact on the data center and the challenges it creates.
-
A new approach to data center management: the economic abstraction of virtual and cloud environments, which enables software to address both the complexity and scale that today challenges application performance.
<[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-challenging-virtual-and-cloud-paradigms?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paradigmwp&utm_content=07062016]]> -The VMTurbo Team
